item.name: Add a new host template with all properties defined (successful)

exec: pm.collectionVariables.set("HostTemplate1Alias", "I'm the first host template created by admin");

pm.test("The host template has been successfully created, with name '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("HostTemplate1Name") + "' and alias '" + pm.collectionVariables.get("HostTemplate1Alias") + "'.", function () {
// Creation of a variable with the ID of the new host template

body.raw:
{
    "name": "host template 1",
    "alias": "I'm the first host template created by admin",
    "snmp_version": "2c",
    "snmp_community": "   snmpCommunity-test",
    "timezone_id": 1,
    "check_command_id": 91,
    "severity_id": {{HostSeverity2Id}},
    "check_command_args": ["OUTPUT"],
    "check_timeperiod_id": 1,
    "note_url": "noteUrl-value",
    "note": "note-value",
    "action_url": "actionUrl-value",
    "max_check_attempts": 3,
    "normal_check_interval": 5,
    "retry_check_interval": 2,
    "active_check_enabled": 1,
    "passive_check_enabled": 0,
    "notification_enabled": 2,
    "notification_options": 31,
    "notification_interval": 5,
    "notification_timeperiod_id": 2,
    "add_inherited_contact_group": true,
    "add_inherited_contact": true,
    "first_notification_delay": 2,
    "recovery_notification_delay": 1,
    "acknowledgement_timeout": 5,
    "freshness_checked": 1,
    "freshness_threshold": 2,
    "flap_detection_enabled": 1,
    "low_flap_threshold": 25,
    "high_flap_threshold": 75,
    "event_handler_enabled": 2,
    "event_handler_command_id": {{CommandId}},
    "event_handler_command_args": ["%d"],
    "icon_id": 1,
    "icon_alternative": "3",
    "categories": [ {{HostCategory1Id}} ],
    "templates": [4],
    "comment": "1, 2, 3",
    "macros": [
        {
        "name": "nameA",
        "value": "valueA",
        "is_password": false,
        "description": "some text"
        },
        {
        "name": "nameB",
        "value": "valueB",
        "is_password": true,
        "description": null
        }
    ]
}

item.name: Add a new host with wrong type of value

exec: pm.test("The host template has not been created, because there are values of the wrong type.", function () {

pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("[name] Boolean value found, but a string is required
[alias] Integer value found, but a null or a string is required
[snmp_version] Boolean value found, but a null or a string is required
[snmp_version] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,"1","2c","3"]
[snmp_community] Integer value found, but a null or a string is required
[timezone_id] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[severity_id] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[check_command_id] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[check_command_args[0]] Integer value found, but a string is required
[check_timeperiod_id] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[max_check_attempts] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[normal_check_interval] Boolean value found, but a null or an integer is required
[retry_check_interval] Boolean value found, but a null or an integer is required
[active_check_enabled] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,0,1,2]
[passive_check_enabled] Boolean value found, but a null or an integer is required
[passive_check_enabled] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,0,1,2]
[notification_enabled] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[notification_enabled] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,0,1,2]
[notification_options] String value found, but an integer or a null is required
[notification_interval] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[notification_timeperiod_id] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[add_inherited_contact_group] String value found, but a null or a boolean is required
[add_inherited_contact] Integer value found, but a null or a boolean is required
[first_notification_delay] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[recovery_notification_delay] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[acknowledgement_timeout] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[freshness_checked] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,0,1,2]
[freshness_threshold] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[flap_detection_enabled] String value found, but a null or an integer is required
[flap_detection_enabled] Does not have a value in the enumeration [null,0,1,2]

[high_flap_threshold] String value found, but a null or an integer is required

");

// Creation of a variable with the ID of the new host

body.raw:
{
    "name": "hst~3!",
    "alias": "I'm the third host crated by admin!",
    "snmp_version": "2c",
    "snmp_community": "snmpCommunity-tst",
    "address": "127.0.0.1",
    "monitoring_server_id": 1,
    "timezone_id": 2,
    "check_command_id": 91,
    "check_timeperiod_id": 1,
    "note_url": "noteUrl!!!!",
    "note": "not",
    "action_url": "actionUrl-oup",
    "max_check_attempts": 6,
    "normal_check_interval": 5,
    "retry_check_interval": 2,
    "active_check_enabled": 1,
    "passive_check_enabled": 0,
    "event_handler_enabled": 2,
    "event_handler_command_id": {{CommandId}},
    "event_handler_command_args": [],
    "icon_id": 1,
    "icon_alternative": "3",
    "categories": [ {{HostCategory1Id}} ],
    "groups": [ {{HostGroup1Id}} ],
    "templates": [ {{HostTemplate1Id}} ],
    "comment": "I am an other test"
}

exec: pm.test("A list of hosts has been successfully fetched.", function () {
pm.test("The hosts retrieved are listed with all parameters", function() {
// Check the properties of each host
"alias": "I'm the first host created by admin",
